                       java.lang.String username,

        Parameters:
        hash - This is the GameCode object on which the player has commented
        username - This is the PlayerProfile object of the player that has commented
        comment - This is the comment of the player

      • getNearByQrs

        public void getNearByQrs​(android.location.Location l,
                         float radius,
                         OnGetNearByQrsListener listener)
        Function to get the nearby locations in the given radius(in meters)
        Parameters:
        l - This is the location around which the nearby locations is found
        radius - This is the radius in meters
        listener - This is the listener that contains the arraylist of the locations

      • getPlayer

        public void getPlayer​(java.lang.String username,
                      OnGetPlayerListener listener)
        This function returns all the data that is stored about a user
        Parameters:
        username - This is the username of the user
        listener - It return a Hashmap of all the data of the user If it returns null that means the player doesn't exist, this can be used to check if the player exists or not.

      • hasScannedBefore

        public void hasScannedBefore​(java.lang.String hash,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             OnHasScannedBeforeListener listener)
        Method to check if the qr has been scanned before by a given user
        Parameters:
        hash - The qr hash
        username - The name of the user
        listener - It returns true if a given user has scanned the qr code before or false if the user didn't scanned the qr before
